response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. This cutting-edge solution is tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses like yours, offering unparalleled capabilities in its field. I understand that the value of this product might be subjective based on your specific requirements and business context. Therefore, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer includes comprehensive setup support and a 1-year maintenance package. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or schedule a demo to see how this product can benefit your company.", "product_price": 1200000}
